desc.1: Unleashes up to 5 slashes, dealing <ct color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</ct>.
desc.2: Repeatedly press or hold the button during the 3rd and 5th hits to extend the chainsaw slash attack.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

desc.0: Press <IconNormal /> during a dodge to activate:
desc.1: Slashes enemies in front, dealing <ct color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</ct>.
desc.2: Repeatedly press or hold the button to extend the chainsaw attack's duration.

desc.0: Press <IconNormal /> during a <ct color=#FFFFFF>Perfect Dodge</ct> to activate:
desc.1: Slashes enemies in front before detonating her chainsaw, dealing <ct color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</ct>.
desc.2: Repeatedly press or hold the button to extend the chainsaw slash attack.
desc.3: Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

desc.1: Unleashes a series of slashes upon enemies in front, before detonating the chainsaw, dealing <ct color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</ct>.
desc.2: Repeatedly press or hold the button to extend the chainsaw slash attack.
desc.3: Anti-Interrupt level is increased while using this skill, and DMG taken is reduced by 40%.

desc.0: With enough Energy, press <IconSpecialReady /> to activate:
desc.1: Unleashes a series of powerful slashes upon enemies in front, before detonating the chainsaw, dealing massive <ct color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</ct>.
desc.2: Repeatedly press or hold the button to extend the chainsaw slash attack at the cost of Energy if the attack connects.
desc.3: Character is invulnerable during the spinning slash.
desc.4: Anti-Interrupt level is increased during the extended slash, and DMG taken is reduced by 40%.

desc.0: When a <ct color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</ct> is triggered, select the character to activate:
desc.1: Unleashes a powerful slash at enemies in a small area, dealing massive <ct color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</ct>.
desc.2: Repeatedly press or hold the button to extend the chainsaw slash attack.
desc.3: Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

desc.0: When Decibel Rating is at <ct color=#FFFFFF>Maximum</ct>, press <IconUltimateReady /> to activate:
desc.1: Unleashes a powerful slash at enemies in a small area, dealing massive <ct color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</ct>.
desc.2: Repeatedly press or hold the button to extend the chainsaw slash attack.
desc.3: Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

desc.0: When the active character is launched, press <IconSwitch /> to activate:
desc.1: Slashes enemies in front before detonating her chainsaw, dealing <ct color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</ct>.
desc.2: Repeatedly press or hold the button to extend the chainsaw slash attack.
desc.3: Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

desc.0: When the character on field is about to be attacked, press <IconSwitch /> to activate:
desc.1: Parries the enemy's attack, dealing massive Daze.
desc.2: This skill excels at parrying enemy attacks and reduces the consumption of <ct color=#FFFFFF>Assist Points</ct> when the character is under intense attacks.
desc.3: Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

desc.0: Press <IconNormal /> after a <ct color=#FFFFFF>Defensive Assist</ct> to activate:
desc.1: Unleash a series of slashes against enemies in front followed by an explosive chainsaw, dealing <ct color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</ct>.
desc.2: Repeatedly press or hold to extend the chainsaw slash attack.
desc.3: Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

core.name: Core Passive: Hyperfocus
desc: After holding or tapping repeatedly, when Corin unleashes a continuous extended slash with her Chainsaw, the skill's DMG increases by <ct color=#2BAD00>18.7%</ct>.
After holding or tapping repeatedly, when Corin unleashes a continuous extended slash with her Chainsaw, the skill's DMG increases by <ct color=#2BAD00>21.8%</ct>.
After holding or tapping repeatedly, when Corin unleashes a continuous extended slash with her Chainsaw, the skill's DMG increases by <ct color=#2BAD00>25%</ct>.
After holding or tapping repeatedly, when Corin unleashes a continuous extended slash with her Chainsaw, the skill's DMG increases by <ct color=#2BAD00>28.1%</ct>.
After holding or tapping repeatedly, when Corin unleashes a continuous extended slash with her Chainsaw, the skill's DMG increases by <ct color=#2BAD00>31.2%</ct>.
After holding or tapping repeatedly, when Corin unleashes a continuous extended slash with her Chainsaw, the skill's DMG increases by <ct color=#2BAD00>34.3%</ct>.
After holding or tapping repeatedly, when Corin unleashes a continuous extended slash with her Chainsaw, the skill's DMG increases by <ct color=#2BAD00>37.5%</ct>.

desc.0: When another character in your squad shares the same Attribute or Faction:
desc.1: Corin deals 35% more DMG to Stunned enemies.

1.name: Open Trauma
1.desc: When Corin's <ct color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</ct> or <ct color=#FFFFFF>Ultimate</ct> hits an enemy, her DMG against the target increases by 12% for 15s.

flavor.0: "The young mistress always said, if something's worth doing, it's worth focusing on."
flavor.1: "I've been practicing, and I can do it now!"

2.name: Atomic Smash
2.desc: When Corin's <ct color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</ct>, <ct color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</ct> or <ct color=#FFFFFF>Ultimate</ct> hits an enemy, the target's <ct color=#F0D12B>Physical RES</ct> is reduced by 0.5%, stacking up to 20 times and lasting 5s. The duration of each stack is calculated separately.

flavor.1: "But I've got work to do... I really am sorry!"
flavor.2: Feeling guilty, Corin sincerely apologizes to the monster — as she wields her savage chainsaw, slicing through the enemies in her way.

3.name: Amateur Maid
3.desc: <ct color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</ct>, <ct color=#FFFFFF>Dodge</ct>, <ct color=#FFFFFF>Assist</ct>, <ct color=#FFFFFF>Special Attack</ct>, and <ct color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</ct> Lv. +2
3.flavor: "I—I'll do my best to become a good maid!" Corin said, walking towards the Ethereals, chainsaw in hand.

4.name: Battlefield Retainer
4.desc: When Corin uses a <ct color=#FFFFFF>Quick Assist</ct>, <ct color=#FFFFFF>Defensive Assist</ct>, or <ct color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</ct>, she recovers 7.2 Energy. This effect can trigger once every 16s.

flavor.0: A diligent and serious young maid, Corin always puts her heart and soul into everything she does.
flavor.1: Of course, that includes taking out enemies in combat.

5.name: Special Ops Maid
5.desc: <ct color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</ct>, <ct color=#FFFFFF>Dodge</ct>, <ct color=#FFFFFF>Assist</ct>, <ct color=#FFFFFF>Special Attack</ct>, and <ct color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</ct> Lv. +2

flavor.0: "Uh... sorry, I'm so clumsy. I don't know how to make sure my cuts are even..."
flavor.1: —Said Corin as she looked down at the bits of Ethereal scattered across the ground.

desc.0: When Corin's extended slash hits an enemy, she obtains a stack of Charge (max 40 stacks).
desc.1: During a <ct color=#FFFFFF>Dodge Counter</ct>, <ct color=#FFFFFF>Special Attack</ct>, <ct color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</ct>, <ct color=#FFFFFF>Quick Assist</ct>, or <ct color=#FFFFFF>Assist Follow-Up</ct>, when her chainsaw detonation hits an enemy, consumes all stacks of Charge. Each stack consumed causes the attack to deal an additional 3% of ATK as DMG.

flavor.0: Corin knows that she isn't the most powerful of maids, nor the smartest. But she hopes to become the hardest working.
flavor.1: She puts to good use everything she's ever learned.
